mapper.select: SELECT q.qna_no, q.user_no, u.user_id, q.qna_title, q.qna_content, q.qna_rdate, r.rep_no, r.admin_id, r.rep_content, r.rep_date FROM qna q LEFT JOIN reply r ON q.qna_no = r.qna_no LEFT JOIN user u ON q.user_no = u.user_no ORDER BY r.rep_date ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review VALUES (#{rev_no}, #{item_no}, #{user_no}, #{rev_title}, #{rev_content}, #{rev_score}, now(), now())
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET rev_title=#{rev_title}, rev_content=#{rev_content}, rev_rdate=now() WHERE rev_no=#{rev_no}
